channel.title: Cannon training spots?
channel.description: I need one, I'm a pure (Range) and I need a spot for it for ultiment pwn.

item.title: Cannon training spots?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

The most southern part of the main continent. The place full of Ogres(They tend to have a nice and high amount of hp, very good for cannons to max out on, A LOT) they don’t have armor or anything on, so you hit on them a lot.

Read full topic

item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

if ure not going for drop then rock crab lol i find it fun all the lvl 80’s oi nub put the cannon away

Read full topic

item.title: Cannon training spots?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Well imo dagganoths are the best for using a cannon on, even if you are a low level.
Just got to complete “Horror from the deep” and my friends record at beating that is at level 31 combat. Then simply go down to where the high level dagganoths are… set up the cannon and put balls in it (remember bring some good food) then run back up the ladder so no more dags can injure you, then after less then 30 seconds i think it should say “Your cannon has ran out of ammo”

I used that when i was training range, don’t know if there are any better spots or if the dags are still good.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannon training spots?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

You’ll suck for using a cannon. It gives no hp xp, and high xp is a must for pures.

Read full topic
